review_text: I was going to spend more money on a more expensive model... however i read some reviews and people swore by this product.I bought it and first day i bought it i pressure cooked a whole chickena nd it turned out great.  IT does the jobs without frills and cleans up great.  Good thing is... if it hits the fan than i can just buy another to replace it.
summary: Took others advice and got the bang for the bike
